talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I have a bad feeling about this thing.
I don't know why, but I do...
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>I'd heard that Hylians tended to avoid
the rain, but I guess that's not true for
you, huh?
I don't mind getting rained on either, but
a lightning storm... Best not to get caught
in that.
BlackZelda_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Don't worry. I'll keep this area safe while
you continue the search.

I believe in you! Give it everything
you've got!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Sad>I've had a nagging feeling ever since
I laid eyes on that strange rock. Like
something bad was going to happen.
But I never would have expected this!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Part of my job as a guard was to keep an
eye on that strange rock, but...I never
expected it to be a Gibdo hive!
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Tired_01>And then, when I stabbed it as hard as
I possibly could...

<sp:0:2:2:5000>Could that be why the Gibdos woke up? N-no,
there's no way.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Just kidding. Well, a little. We DID fight
for our lives together in Kara Kara Bazaar.
I'd be a bit sad if you didn't remember...
Speaking of remembering, I never got a
chance to express my gratitude for your
help back then. Sarqso.
Oh, I guess I should get used to speaking
your language while I'm out here, huh?<sp:5:1:0>
Ahem. Thank you.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>What do you think? My pronunciation was
spot on, wasn't it? <sp:5:1:0>I hope soâ€”I learned
the phrase and practiced all the way here!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Even though there was no way to know it
was a Gibdo hive... Stabbing it recklessly
was a terrible idea in retrospect.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><sp:0:2:2:5000>That's got to be why the Gibdos woke up. <sp:5:1:0>But maybe
not... <sp:5:1:0>I hope not...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'd always thought of Hylians as small,
calm people. Now I've learned that you
are also loyal, skilled weapon crafters!
<snd:Greeting>Those traits are admirable to any soldier.


You know, as long as I'm here...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Maybe after we find Princess Zelda, I
should try to find my special voe...
BlackZelda_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, whoops.<sp:5:0:0> I'm keeping you, aren't I?


You're here because you heard the rumor,
right?<sp:5:1:0> Get going, then.
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>From here, I can just make out the pattern
on Hyrule Castle's flags, but that's it...

Maybe I should've spent some time
training my eyesight rather than focusing
solely on spear practice...
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I heard there was no sign of Princess
Zelda within Hyrule Castle...

<sp:3:0:2:0000>We can't give up though. She must be
out there somewhere.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If someone had told me years ago that I'd
stand guard alongside Hylians, I'd have
laughed in their face.<sp:5:1:0> But here I am...
BlackZelda_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh. I'd heard that most Hylians prefer
to avoid the rain, but not you, it seems.

<sp:3:0:2:0500>Oh, I understand. This is how committed
you are to finding Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Admiration>Admirable. <sp:5:0:0>But watch out for lightning.<sp:5:0:0>
Finding the princess is important, but you
need to take care of yourself too.
